com.siperian.sam

Interface AuthorizationProvider

  • All Superinterfaces:
    SamProvider

    public interface AuthorizationProvider
extends SamProvider
    This provides a standard interface for implementing SAM Authorization providers

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String IS_ACCESS_ALLOWED
      Must be returned by the getCapabilities method in case of full implementation

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Map isAccessAllowed(List resources, String privilegeType, UserProfile userProfile)
      Authorizes user request to perform specified action on specified resource

      • Methods inherited from interface com.siperian.sam.SamProvider

        getCapabilties, hasCapability

    • Field Detail

      • IS_ACCESS_ALLOWED

        static final String IS_ACCESS_ALLOWED
        Must be returned by the getCapabilities method in case of full implementation
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • isAccessAllowed

        Map isAccessAllowed(List resources,
                    String privilegeType,
                    UserProfile userProfile)
        Authorizes user request to perform specified action on specified resource
        Parameters:
        resources - - the list of requested resources
        privilegeType - - the type of privilege requested
        userProfile - - UserProfile object identifying current user
        Returns:
        Map of AuthorizationDecision objects for each resource in the list, null if not applicable.
